name: Arcane Spyglass
oracle_text:
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice a land: Draw a card and put a charge counter on Arcane Spyglass.
Remove three charge counters from Arcane Spyglass: Draw a card.
flavor_text: It breaches not physical distances but temporal ones.

name: Arcbound Bruiser
oracle_text: Modular 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)
flavor_text: Break in case of emergency.

name: Arcbound Hybrid
oracle_text:
Haste
Modular 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)

name: Arcbound Stinger
oracle_text:
Flying
Modular 1 (This creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)

name: Arcbound Worker
oracle_text: Modular 1 (This creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)
flavor_text: The parts are as strong as the whole.

name: Auriok Glaivemaster
oracle_text: As long as Auriok Glaivemaster is equipped, it gets +1/+1 and has first strike.
flavor_text: "Give me a bit of steel and I'll deliver it into the hearts of my enemies."

name: Barbed Lightning
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Barbed Lightning deals 3 damage to target creature.
• Barbed Lightning deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.
Entwine {2} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)
flavor_text: Every creature on Mirrodin is a lightning rod.

name: Burden of Greed
oracle_text: Target player loses 1 life for each tapped artifact they control.
flavor_text:
"The one who dies with the most toys is still dead."
—Geth, keeper of the Vault

name: Chittering Rats
oracle_text: When Chittering Rats enters the battlefield, target opponent puts a card from their hand on top of their library.
flavor_text: Bottom feeders sometimes rise to the top.

name: Crazed Goblin
oracle_text: Crazed Goblin attacks each combat if able.
flavor_text: Because fighting is easier than figuring out what else to do.

name: Darksteel Citadel
oracle_text:
Indestructible
{T}: Add {C}.
flavor_text: Panopticon, forge of the Darksteel Eye, home of Mirrodin's keeper.

name: Darksteel Ingot
oracle_text:
Indestructible
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

name: Darksteel Pendant
oracle_text:
Indestructible (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy this artifact.)
{1}, {T}: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

name: Drill-Skimmer
oracle_text:
Flying
Drill-Skimmer has shroud as long as you control another artifact creature. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor_text: In close proximity, their magnetic energies merge and form a field of protection.

name: Drooling Ogre
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts an artifact spell, that player gains control of Drooling Ogre. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
flavor_text:
"Is it the stomping kind or the munching kind?"
—Slobad, goblin tinkerer

name: Dross Golem
oracle_text:
Affinity for Swamps (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Swamp you control.)
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
flavor_text: The longer it skulks through the corrosive gases of Mephidross, the more it adopts their thirst for death.

name: Echoing Calm
oracle_text: Destroy target enchantment and all other enchantments with the same name as that enchantment.
flavor_text: A single light unleashes a hail of cleansing.

name: Echoing Courage
oracle_text: Target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature get +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: A single seed unleashes a flurry of growth.

name: Echoing Decay
oracle_text: Target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature get -2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: A single fear unleashes a torrent of nightmares.

name: Echoing Ruin
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact and all other artifacts with the same name as that artifact.
flavor_text: A single misstep unleashes an avalanche of ruin.

name: Echoing Truth
oracle_text: Return target nonland permanent and all other permanents with the same name as that permanent to their owners' hands.
flavor_text: A single lie unleashes a tide of disbelief.

name: Essence Drain
oracle_text: Essence Drain deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.
flavor_text: Mephidross claims all life within it. What cannot be twisted is absorbed.

name: Grimclaw Bats
oracle_text:
Flying
{B}, Pay 1 life: Grimclaw Bats gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Even on a world of metal, there are those who thirst for blood.

name: Hallow
oracle_text: Prevent all damage target spell would deal this turn. You gain life equal to the damage prevented this way.
flavor_text: "Bend with the storm, then reply in kind."

name: Hunger of the Nim
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each artifact you control.
flavor_text: Their pain is so great, they can't help but share it with others.

name: Inflame
oracle_text: Inflame deals 2 damage to each creature dealt damage this turn.
flavor_text: A Vulshok weapon strikes with the fire of the forge that made it.

name: Krark-Clan Stoker
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Add {R}{R}.
flavor_text: Fallen enemies are fed to the scavengers. Fallen friends are thrown into the Great Furnace, their souls returned to the Great Mother.

name: Leonin Bola
oracle_text:
Equipped creature has "{T}, Unattach Leonin Bola: Tap target creature."
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery. This card enters the battlefield unattached and stays on the battlefield if the creature leaves.)

name: Loxodon Mystic
oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor_text: As the nim storm across the plains, a lone priest stands in their path. At his silent gesture, the battle line breaks, and the tide turns.

name: Machinate
oracle_text: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of artifacts you control. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
flavor_text: As long as there are questions to be asked, the vedalken will ask them.

name: Magnetic Flux
oracle_text: Artifact creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: After the researcher's astonishing success, his assistants spent six hours finding a way to return the specimens safely to the ground.

name: Metal Fatigue
oracle_text: Tap all artifacts.
flavor_text: The Auriok have fought the metal hordes for so long now that knowing how to cripple them has become an instinct.

name: Myr Landshaper
oracle_text: {T}: Target land becomes an artifact in addition to its other types until end of turn.
flavor_text: One thing the myr can't do is enjoy the scenery.

name: Myr Moonvessel
oracle_text: When Myr Moonvessel dies, add {C}.
flavor_text: Memnarch created the myr with three qualities in mind: dependability, controllability, and disposability.

name: Neurok Prodigy
oracle_text:
Flying
Discard an artifact card: Return Neurok Prodigy to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: "Why should I be bound by rules when I can see so far beyond them?"

name: Nourish
oracle_text: You gain 6 life.
flavor_text: Gelfruit grows abundantly wherever Sylvok druids live, as if the Tangle knows that humans are not as hardy as the beasts or as nimble as the elves.

name: Oxidda Golem
oracle_text:
Affinity for Mountains (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Mountain you control.)
Haste
flavor_text: The longer it patrols the smoldering crags of the Oxidda Chain, the more it adopts their fiery temper.

name: Pteron Ghost
oracle_text:
Flying
Sacrifice Pteron Ghost: Regenerate target artifact.
flavor_text: Defending to the death isn't always enough.

name: Quicksilver Behemoth
oracle_text:
Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
When Quicksilver Behemoth attacks or blocks, return it to its owner's hand at end of combat. (Return it only if it's on the battlefield.)

name: Razor Golem
oracle_text:
Affinity for Plains (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Plains you control.)
Vigilance
flavor_text: The longer it stands among the deadly blades of the Razor Fields, the more it adopts their harsh exterior.

name: Reap and Sow
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target land.
• Search your library for a land card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
Entwine {1}{G} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

name: Ritual of Restoration
oracle_text: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Leonin raising ceremonies take place at the white sun's dawn, the rebirth of artifacts mirroring the birth of a new day.

name: Scavenging Scarab
oracle_text: Scavenging Scarab can't block.
flavor_text: The beetles feed not on the flesh of corpses but on the metal, grinding out the iron and steel to add to their own bulky shells.

name: Spire Golem
oracle_text:
Affinity for Islands (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Island you control.)
Flying
flavor_text: The longer it soars above the shimmering swirls of the Quicksilver Sea, the more it adopts their unpredictability.

name: Tangle Golem
oracle_text: Affinity for Forests (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Forest you control.)
flavor_text: The longer it weaves through the twisted vines of the Tangle, the more it adopts their hidden strength.

name: Tangle Spider
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: They're considered good luck by the elves they don't eat.

name: Tel-Jilad Outrider
oracle_text: Protection from artifacts
flavor_text: "When the levelers come again, we shall be ready for them."

name: Tel-Jilad Wolf
oracle_text: Whenever Tel-Jilad Wolf becomes blocked by an artifact creature, Tel-Jilad Wolf gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Thanks to the wolves, Tel-Jilad is the one area of Mirrodin the myr don't see often.

name: Unforge
oracle_text: Destroy target Equipment. If that Equipment was attached to a creature, Unforge deals 2 damage to that creature.
flavor_text: Compared to the fire of the forge, the strength of steel is nothing.

name: Ur-Golem's Eye
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}{C}.
flavor_text: It still stares accusingly at Memnarch, though millennia have passed since he separated the eye from its body.

name: Vedalken Engineer
oracle_text: {T}: Add two mana of any one color. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.
flavor_text: Art is unknown to the vedalken—for them, all creations must serve a purpose.

name: Vex
oracle_text: Counter target spell. That spell's controller may draw a card.
flavor_text:
"The druids would be better off if they spent more time in the lab and less time watching trees grow."
—Pontifex, elder researcher

name: Viridian Acolyte
oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: "We have no sun to guide our dead, so I tend the prismatic flames of the spirit fires that show the souls their way. When I die, I hope there is one left to guide my spirit home."

name: Vulshok Morningstar
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+2.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Whispersilk Cloak
oracle_text:
Equipped creature can't be blocked and has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Equip {2}
